sense.def:
To tighten one's hold on something
pomeni nekaj držati močneje.

seg.quote: He tightened his grip on the spear.
His fingers tightened around his rifle.

sense.def:
To tighten a rope or chain
pomeni nategniti ali vleči vrv ali verigo, dokler se ne zravna.

seg.quote: The chain tightened and the pig's leg was pulled back.

sense.def:
To tighten controls
pomeni uvesti strožji nadzor.

seg.quote: The authorities tightened security around the embassy.

sense.def:
To tighten up a rule
pomeni poskrbeti, da pravilo postane strožje.

seg.quote: Regulations on the testing of drugs have been tightened up.
